text: Blaise Matuidi (born 9 April 1987) is a French professional footballer. He plays as a midfielder for MLS club Inter Miami and the France national team. On 17 March 2020, Matuidi tested positive for COVID-19, amid its pandemic in Italy. ==Career statistics== ===Club=== Appearances and goals by club, season and competition Club Season League National
